reqs: Pre-reqs: Either (a) all of BIOL 200, BIOL 201, CHEM 233, CHEM 235 or (b) all of BIOL 200, BIOL 201, CHEM 203, CHEM 204; and CHEM 211 and one of CHEM 205, CHEM 201. (Permission of the undergraduate adviser is required.)
description: The concepts, language and techniques of scientific pharmacology. Intended primarily for Honours and Major students in Pharmacology.
